Great game!  I really enjoyed playing it!  The story is amazing.  Some of the puzzles are hard but fun.  This game made me really enjoy puzzle games for the first time.  It's a beautifully crafted game and is just awesome.  Portal 2 is one of my most favorite video games of all time.  It is one of the best video games ever made.  I give it a 25/10.

This game is great without knowledge of the first. I enjoy this game over the first because of more test chambers and mutiplayer mode. The old game had about 19 chambers. This game game has over 30 chambers. This is like one of those games you play more than twice. They have also allowed you to create single or mutiplayer chambers. So get creative.

Welcome to our facility test subjects!
We are glad that you enjoyed our previous experiment and you are willing to participate in the next round. This time it will be more fun! New challenges await you! If you like you can invite your companion and solve puzzles together. Isn't that brilliant?
You should not worry that your stay here will be short. Our fellow scientists from parallel words are constantly working on new test chambers so you can enjoy it for a little bit longer.
